languages.text: "Моя личная святыня. Это — полковая {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}аквила{/g}, вернее, ее остаток, переживший атаку, взрывы и пламя. Для меня она — память о том, что чистоту и сияние можно сохранить даже в сердце тьмы".

traits.locale_text: "Моя личная святыня. Это — полковая аквила, вернее, ее остаток, переживший атаку, взрывы и пламя. Для меня она — память о том, что чистоту и сияние можно сохранить даже в сердце тьмы".

languages.text: "My own relic. It's the regiment's {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}, or rather, the fragment that survived the attack, the explosions, and the fire. For me it's a reminder that purity and radiance can be preserved even in the heart of darkness."
languages.original_text: "Моя личная святыня. Это — полковая {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}аквила{/g}, вернее, ее остаток, переживший атаку, взрывы и пламя. Для меня она — память о том, что чистоту и сияние можно сохранить даже в сердце тьмы".

traits.locale_text: "My own relic. It's the regiment's Aquila, or rather, the fragment that survived the attack, the explosions, and the fire. For me it's a reminder that purity and radiance can be preserved even in the heart of darkness."

"My own relic. It's the regiment's {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}, or rather, the fragment that survived the attack, the explosions, and the fire. For me it's a reminder that purity and radiance can be preserved even in the heart of darkness."

languages.text: “那是我自己的圣物，是那个军团的{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}双头鹰{/g}徽章。或者换个说法，它是在袭击、爆炸与大火中幸存下来的碎片。对我来说，它仿佛是在提醒我——即便是在黑暗的核心，纯洁与光明也依然不会泯灭。”
languages.original_text: "My own relic. It's the regiment's {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}, or rather, the fragment that survived the attack, the explosions, and the fire. For me it's a reminder that purity and radiance can be preserved even in the heart of darkness."

traits.locale_text: “那是我自己的圣物，是那个军团的{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}双头鹰{/g}徽章。或者换个说法，它是在袭击、爆炸与大火中幸存下来的碎片。对我来说，它仿佛是在提醒我——即便是在黑暗的核心，纯洁与光明也依然不会泯灭。”

languages.original_text: "My own relic. It's the regiment's Aquila, or rather, the fragment that survived the attack, the explosions, and the fire. For me it's a reminder that purity and radiance can be preserved even in the heart of darkness."

languages.text: «Es mi propia reliquia. Es el {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} del regimiento. Bueno, lo que queda de ella: un fragmento que sobrevivió al ataque, a las explosiones y al fuego. Para mí es un recordatorio de que la pureza y el resplandor pueden sobrevivir incluso en el corazón de las tinieblas».
languages.original_text: "My own relic. It's the regiment's {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}, or rather, the fragment that survived the attack, the explosions, and the fire. For me it's a reminder that purity and radiance can be preserved even in the heart of darkness."

traits.locale_text: «Es mi propia reliquia. Es el {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} del regimiento. Bueno, lo que queda de ella: un fragmento que sobrevivió al ataque, a las explosiones y al fuego. Para mí es un recordatorio de que la pureza y el resplandor pueden sobrevivir incluso en el corazón de las tinieblas».

languages.text: 「私自身の遺物だ。連隊の{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}アクィラ{/g}、いや、攻撃、爆発、火災を生き延びた破片だ。私にとっては、暗闇の中でも純粋さと輝きが保たれるということを思い出させるものだ」
languages.original_text: "My own relic. It's the regiment's {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}, or rather, the fragment that survived the attack, the explosions, and the fire. For me it's a reminder that purity and radiance can be preserved even in the heart of darkness."

traits.locale_text: 「私自身の遺物だ。連隊の{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}アクィラ{/g}、いや、攻撃、爆発、火災を生き延びた破片だ。私にとっては、暗闇の中でも純粋さと輝きが保たれるということを思い出させるものだ」

languages.text: "Mein eigenes Relikt. Das ist die {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} des Regiments, oder besser gesagt das Fragment, welches den Angriff, die Explosionen und das Feuer überlebt hat. Mich erinnert es daran, dass Reinheit und Glanz selbst im Herzen der Dunkelheit bewahrt werden können."
languages.original_text: "My own relic. It's the regiment's {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}, or rather, the fragment that survived the attack, the explosions, and the fire. For me it's a reminder that purity and radiance can be preserved even in the heart of darkness."

traits.locale_text: "Mein eigenes Relikt. Das ist die {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} des Regiments, oder besser gesagt das Fragment, welches den Angriff, die Explosionen und das Feuer überlebt hat. Mich erinnert es daran, dass Reinheit und Glanz selbst im Herzen der Dunkelheit bewahrt werden können."

languages.text: « C'est ma propre relique. Il s'agit de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} du régiment, ou plutôt du fragment qui a survécu à l'attaque, aux explosions et aux flammes. Il me rappelle que la pureté et la lumière peuvent être préservées, même au cœur des ténèbres. »
languages.original_text: "My own relic. It's the regiment's {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}, or rather, the fragment that survived the attack, the explosions, and the fire. For me it's a reminder that purity and radiance can be preserved even in the heart of darkness."

traits.locale_text: « C'est ma propre relique. Il s'agit de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} du régiment, ou plutôt du fragment qui a survécu à l'attaque, aux explosions et aux flammes. Il me rappelle que la pureté et la lumière peuvent être préservées, même au cœur des ténèbres. »

languages.text: "Şahsi yadigârım. Alayın {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Çift Başlı Kartal'ı{/g}. Taarruzdan, patlamalardan ve yangınlardan geriye kalanı yani. Karanlığın kalbinde bile saflığın ve nurun korunabileceğini anımsatan bir hatıra."
languages.original_text: "My own relic. It's the regiment's {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}, or rather, the fragment that survived the attack, the explosions, and the fire. For me it's a reminder that purity and radiance can be preserved even in the heart of darkness."

traits.locale_text: "Şahsi yadigârım. Alayın {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Çift Başlı Kartal{/g}'ı. Taarruzun, patlamaların ve yangınların ardından geriye kalan kısmı yani. Bu, karanlığın kalbinde bile saflığın ve nurun korunabileceğini bana anımsatan bir hatıra."
